word_mean: 有遗迹、痕迹、遗物性质的

sentence.Network_en: vestigial traces of an earlier culture
The wings of the chicken have become vestigial; it can no longer fly.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸡的翅膀逐渐退化, 不会在空中飞行了.

sentence.Network_en: Vestigial remains of these plays are now seen in the Christmas pantomime.
sentence.Network_cn: 在圣诞节演出的哑剧中还能看到这些戏剧残留下来的痕迹。

entry.def: Vestigial is used to describe the small amounts of something that still remain of a larger or more important thing.

example.ex: Vestigial remains of these plays are now seen in the Christmas pantomime.
example.tran: 在圣诞节演出的哑剧中还能看到这些戏剧残留下来的痕迹。

means.word_mean: 1. not fully developed in mature animals;

auth_sentence.content: In some Colorado counties, democracy was nearly vestigial.
auth_sentence.res_content: In some Colorado counties, democracy was nearly vestigial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In some Colorado counties, democracy was nearly vestigial.

auth_sentence.content: He feels a vestigial flicker of anger from last night.
auth_sentence.res_content: He feels a vestigial flicker of anger from last night.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He feels a vestigial flicker of anger from last night.

auth_sentence.content: On downy white breasts, rosy-red nipples had become all but vestigial.
auth_sentence.res_content: On downy white breasts, rosy-red nipples had become all but vestigial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On downy white breasts, rosy-red nipples had become all but vestigial.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =of,relating to,characterized by…… 表形容词,"关于……的,有……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bene好+fic做+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.[to]有利的,有益的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商业的;商务的;可获利的
stems_affixes.word_buile: commerce商业+ial关于……的,有……的→商业的;商务的
con共同+gen产生+ial关于……的,有……的→产生共同[兴趣]→情投意合的
consequent作为结果的,随之发生的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.产生后果的,重要的
con共同+viv生命+ial关于……的,有……的→共同活跃的→欢乐的
different不同的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.差别的 n.差别,差异;微分
influent流入的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.有影响的,有势力的
